#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,k,p,temp;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              p=1;
       cin>>n>>k;
       if(n%2==0)
       {
              temp=n/2-1;
              while(temp--)
              p=p*10;
              p=p+k-1;
              cout<<endl<<p;
               while(p>=1)
               {
                       cout<<p%10;
                       p=p/10;
               }
       }
       else
       {
              temp=n/2;
              while(temp--)
              p=p*10;
              p=p+k-1;
              cout<<endl<<p;
              p=p/10;
               while(p>=1)
               {
                       cout<<p%10;
                       p=p/10;
               }
       }
    }
    return 0;
}
